import React, { Component } from "react"; import Bid_item1 from "./Bid_item1"; import './Main.css'; class Main extends Component{ updateBid = async()=>{ let curr= this.props.CurrentBid() let prev = this.props.PreviousBid() console.log("curr: " , curr) console.log("prev: " ,prev) this.setState({curr_addr:curr[0]}) this.setState({curr_amount:curr[1]}) this.setState({prev_addr:prev[0]}) this.setState({prev_amount:prev[1]}) } constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ prev_addr:'0x0000000000000', curr_addr:'0x0000000000000', prev_amount:'0', curr_amount:'0' } } render(){ return(
{ event.preventDefault() let amount = this.input.value.toString() amount = window.web3.utils.toWei(amount,'Ether') this.props.PlaceBid(amount) }} > {this.input = input}}>
{ event.preventDefault() this.updateBid() }} >
# Address Amount
Current: {this.state.curr_addr} {this.state.curr_amount}
Previous: {this.state.prev_addr} {this.state.prev_amount}
) } } export default Main;
